Variables.__comment__Display Variables__: The number of variables to be selected at the start

Markers.__comment__Plot Markers__: Acceptable Values: [Square, Circle, Triangle Point Up, Plus, Cross, Diamond, Triangle Point Down, Square Cross, Star, Diamond Plus, Circle Plus, Triangles Up And Down, Square Plus, Circle Cross, Square And Triangle Down, Filled Square, Filled Circle, Filled Triangle Point Up, Filled Diamond, Solid Circle, Bullet (Smaller Circle)
Markers.__comment__Marker Size__: Acceptable Values: 0.5 to 2.5 by steps of 0.1

Markers.__comment__Plot Markers__: Acceptable Values: [Square, Circle, Triangle Point Up, Plus, Cross, Diamond, Triangle Point Down, Square Cross, Star, Diamond Plus, Circle Plus, Triangles Up And Down, Square Plus, Circle Cross, Square And Triangle Down, Filled Square, Filled Circle, Filled Triangle Point Up, Filled Diamond, Solid Circle, Bullet (Smaller Circle)
Markers.__comment__Marker Size__: Acceptable Values: 0.5 to 2.5 by steps of 0.1

Data Table.__comment__Weight Amount__: Acceptable Values: 0.01 to 1 by steps of 0.01

Coloring.__comment__Color Palette__: Acceptable Values: [Rainbow, Heat, Terrain, Topo, Cm, Custom]
Coloring.__comment__Saturation__: Acceptable Values: 0 to 1 by steps of 0.025
Coloring.__comment__Value/Brightness__: Acceptable Values: 0 to 1 by steps of 0.025
Coloring.__comment__Custom Colors__: An Array of Hex codes formatted like this: #FFFFFF

Configuration.__comment__sigma__: Acceptable Values: 1 to 11 by steps of 0.1
